participant_1.background:
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I lost everything when the economy crashed.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
i enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing.
My family is not well off and I wish I could go to a better school.
i wish that i lived in the city.
I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hello, my day is going well so far. Thank you for asking. How is your day going?
My day is going great! I just got back from hiking the Appalachian trail. It was a lot of fun, but I am really tired.
That sounds like a great experience! I've always wanted to go hiking, but I've never had the time.
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of work. I'm glad I did it, but I'm not sure if I'll do it again anytime soon.
I can understand that. It sounds like it was a challenging experience. I'm sure you're glad you did it though.
Yeah, I'm glad I did it. It was a great way to see some beautiful scenery and get some exercise.
That's great! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out clubbing, dress up, and take pictures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been clubbing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a lot of fun to dance and socialize with people.
I will have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll let you know how it goes if I do.
No problem! I'm sure you'll have a great time
